ygData.subject: A question
ygData.msgSnippet: Where did you hunt at 9th lvl?  10th?  11th?  I m in this stage right now.  I m having fun killing Skeleton Lrodd in Befallen now.  I can solo him with my pet
ygData.messageBody:
Where did you hunt at 9th lvl? 10th? 11th? I'm in this stage right now. I'm having
fun killing Skeleton Lrodd in Befallen now. I can solo him with my pet and he's
usually red to me :) I love being a necro.

Manuael





Mark Muller wrote:

> From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> > :) This would be hard! You should also have a bard in the group to play
> mana song.
> > Also an enchanter to tashani, and stun if it isn't resisted. You would
> also have to
> > have plenty of FS daggers and a mage to summon his dagger since a pet
> can't duel wield
> > two weapons of the same kind.
> >
> > Manuael
>
> Or those little 2p daggers from *any* weapon merchant that have delay 20 ;)
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be tolerated
